metadata.title: CVE-2019-17362 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In LibTomCrypt through 1.18.2, the der_decode_utf8_string function (inder_decode_utf8_string.c) does not properly detect certain invalid UTF-8sequences. This allows context-dependent attackers to cause a denial ofservice (out-of-bounds read and crash) or read information from othermemory locations via carefully crafted DER-encoded data.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-17362` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtomcrypt0 - 1.17-7ubuntu0.1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libtomcrypt package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.17-7ubuntu0.1+esm1').
